titles.title: Tax Exemption for American Medalists Act
Tax Exemption for American Medalists Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude from gross income any prizes or awards won in competition in the Olympic Games and Paralympic Games.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Tax Exemption for American Medalists Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income, for income tax purposes, the value of any medal awarded in, or any prize money received from the U.S. Olympic Committee on account of, competition in the Olympic Games or Paralympic Games.
